name: Women Helpline (All India)
description: Provides immediate assistance to women in distress, addressing issues like harassment and abuse.

name: Women Helpline (Domestic Abuse)
description: Offers support and guidance to women facing domestic violence, including counseling and legal aid.

name: National Commission for Women (NCW)
description: A 24x7 helpline addressing issues related to sexual violence and harassment, connecting callers with appropriate authorities.

name: Delhi Commission for Women
description: Provides assistance to women in Delhi facing issues like harassment, violence, and discrimination.

name: Childline India
description: A 24-hour toll-free service for children in distress, offering emergency assistance and linking them to relevant services.

name: National Human Rights Commission
description: Addresses human rights violations, including those against women, ensuring protection and redressal.

name: Police
description: Emergency police assistance for any situation requiring immediate law enforcement intervention.

name: Emergency Services
description: Provides integrated medical, police, and fire emergency services across India.

name: Cyber Crime Helpline
description: Assists individuals facing cyber threats, online harassment, and cybercrimes.

name: Shakti Shalini (NGO)
description: Offers shelter, support, and counseling to survivors of violence and abuse.

name: Arogyavani Health Helpline
description: Provides medically validated advice, health counseling services, and information about health-related schemes.

name: Rape Crisis Cell
description: Offers support and legal assistance to rape survivors in Delhi.

name: Dowry Prevention Officer (North District, Delhi)
description: Handles complaints related to dowry harassment and provides assistance to affected women.

name: War Widows Association
description: Supports war widows through counseling, financial aid, and rehabilitation programs.

name: Centre for Social Research
description: Engages in advocacy and provides support on women's issues, including violence and discrimination.

name: Invisible Scar (Hyderabad)
description: Offers counseling and support to survivors of domestic violence and abuse.

name: National Legal Aid Helpline
description: Provides free legal assistance to women seeking justice and legal support.

name: Women Power Connect (WPC)
description: A network offering legal advice and referral support to women in need.
